metadata.title: CVE-2023-41909 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in FRRouting FRR through 9.0.bgp_nlri_parse_flowspec in bgpd/bgp_flowspec.c processes malformed requestswith no attributes, leading to a NULL pointer dereference.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-41909` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

frr - 8.1-1ubuntu1.6
frr-pythontools - 8.1-1ubuntu1.6
frr-rpki-rtrlib - 8.1-1ubuntu1.6
frr-snmp - 8.1-1ubuntu1.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: frr package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.1-1ubuntu1.6').
